title: To alter human behavior: without mind control (TEFC)
creator_credit: Document Associates, Philip S. Hobel, Douglas Leiterman and Daniel Chaykin
brief_description: Investigates techniques underway. But raises ethical questions whether behaviour can be modified without subjects’ consent, and how to ensure that, having developed ways of altering behaviour, control remains in the right hands.
